Judul: DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT OF EMISSION SPECTRA OBSERVATION SYSTEM OF ATMOSPHERIC PRESSURE MICROPLASMA USING DVD SEGMENT AND POCKET DIGITAL CAMERA
Abstrak: A system was made to observe the gas emission spectrum from an atmospheric pressure microdischarge excited by a 12 MHz radio frequency. The spectrum was taken by a simple spectrometer made out of a DVD segment and a pocket digital camera. At least one band from the First Negative System of N2+ was observed.
Kata Kunci: Emission spectra observation system, Atmospheric pressure microplasma, DVD segment, Pocket digital camera
